data.message:
Hi friends and family

I wanted to let you know that I have recently started a new business. I am selling motor club memberships They provide their members with Emergency Roadside Assistance for:
Jump Start
Flat Tire Change
Auto Unlock
Fuel Delivery (Cost of Fuel Excluded)
Mechanical and Accident Towing

With no out of pocket expense. 

Additionally, they pay to fight your traffic tickets, and even reimburse you for a portion of your emergency room cost on covered accidents. 
Our memberships designed to meet your needs and give you Peace of Mind. 

We initially collect first and last month dues to help ensure that your membership is always in force. 
 To learn more 

Like this post:
 Message info

Thank You,
